A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: the low score from audiences really surprised me. after watching the last Jedi I think this is way better than the force awakens. I feel this one really has its own feel to it and doesn't feel like a retelling of another entry in the series before it. Rian Johnson did an amazing job moving the saga forward\, and I can't wait to see what he has in store for his other outings in the franchise.
